title: Firefox 89.01 Yahoo email print problems
content:
The last few versions of Firefox will not print certain emails from Yahoo correctly. The printing of the body of the email will start more than half way down the page, sometimes on page 2. The item being printed fits on one page. Page settings are correct. Have reset printer settings in Firefox. Started Firefox without any extensions, no change.

The same emails print perfectly on Opera, Vivaldi, and Google Chrome.

Thanks for any suggestions.
creator: MarkTB

title: Barra de direcciones con demasiados resultados, no puedo ver mis motores de búsqueda
content:
Sorry for spanish

Antiguamente cuando escribía algo en la barra de direcciones se me sugerían algunos resultados de búsqueda y recomendaciones de mi historial/marcadores, pero estos eran pocos, de manera que al final de las recomendaciones podía seleccionar uno de mis motores de búsqueda. Tal como en la primera imagen.

Sin embargo, ahora aparecen demasiadas sugerencias y ya no puedo ver mis motores pues estos quedan demasiado abajo en la pantalla y no es posible hacer scroll.

He intentado configurar que no busque entre mi historial/marcadores para que las sugerencias sean menos pero no ha funcionado, me pone en ese caso muchas sugerencias de búsqueda, en caso contrario si configuro que no haga sugerencias de búsqueda y sólo sugiera historial/marcadores sucede lo mismo, las sugerencias son demasiadas y no me permiten ver los motores de búsqueda.
creator: k1r4.uwu

title: Hãy tử tế. Tình nguyện viên của chúng tôi là những người dùng Mozilla giống như bạn, những người dành thời gian trong ngày để trợ giúp
content: Theo dõi qua. Đôi khi, các tình nguyện viên của chúng tôi sẽ yêu cầu bạn cung cấp thêm thông tin hoặc thử nghiệm các tình huống nhất định. Bạn có thể làm điều này càng sớm, họ càng sớm biết cách sửa chữa nó.
creator: Phamvuminhhieu50

title: Can't sign in to Charter email on Firefox. Can sign in using Edge
content: Can't sign in to Charter email on Firefox. Can sign in using Edge. How can I fix It?
creator: bstewart006

title: syncing bookmarks betwen two devices
content:
Laptop 1 has bookmark //a.html Laptop 2 has bookmark //b.html Both devices log in with bookmark sync turned on.

Q1. Do both devices now have bookmarks a and b?

Q2. Laptop 1 deletes bookmark a. Does that delete bookmark a from device 2?

Q3. Laptop 1 adds //c.html. Does that add c to device 2?

It would be very nice if mozilla would officially explain what happens when bookmarks are synced. Just saying that they are synchronized does not explain what happens. Synchronization can be accomplished in multiple ways.
creator: dblake22
